notesstmt.note: Memo in Judeo-Arabic to the court scribe to write a promissory note on 96 dirhems, apparently the outcome of litigation in the court; This note has been written as a secondary inscription, on a piece from the right edge of the blank verso of a previous document. Of this primary inscription, only five partial lines are extant. They appear to be from a court record of testimony.
Condition: losses along all edges; folded widthwise five times.
